thread.title: Uga IX to retire as UGA mascot
thread.title_full: Uga IX to retire as UGA mascot

title: Uga IX to retire as UGA mascot
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Uga IX to retire as UGA mascot Uga IX, the English Bulldog affectionately known as Russ to Georgia Bulldogs fans, is retiring, the school announced on Thursday. Post to Facebook Uga IX to retire as UGA mascot Uga IX, the English Bulldog affectionately known as Russ to Georgia Bulldogs fans, is retiring, the school announced on Thursday.  //on.11alive.com/1LPlEjq   Join the Conversation To   Uga IX to retire as UGA mascot 11Alive Staff, WXIA 2:55 p.m. EDT October 22, 2015 Russ 2 CONNECT 11 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
ATHENS, Ga. -- Uga IX, the English Bulldog affectionately known as Russ to Georgia Bulldogs fans, is retiring, the school announced on Thursday. 
Russ worked 38 games as Uga IX from 2012 to 2014 after 25 games as interim mascot beginning in 2009. The English Bulldog is 11. 
While mascot, Georgia compiled a record of 44-19. Russ took over after Uga VII and VIII passed away. 
The school's new mascot, Uga X, known as "Que," will be introduced at the Georgia vs. Georgia Southern game on Nov. 21. 
Que made appearances at the Countdown to Kickoff event in July, and Picture Day in August. He's presided over all of Georgia's games this season. 
"We are thrilled to have Que join our long line of mascots and he has already proven to be up to the task of serving as our official mascot,'' said J. Reid Parker Director of Athletics Greg McGarity in a press release. ''We tip our cap to Russ, who served admirably as UGA IX and has been a great mentor to Que, UGA X. 
Que (Photo by Rob Saye) (Photo: Rob Saye) 
The continuous line of Georgia Bulldog mascots has been owned by the Frank W. “Sonny” Seiler family of Savannah, Ga., since 1956. Que (Photo by Rob Saye) Rob Saye Fullscreen NEW ORLEANS - JThe University of Georgia Bulldogs mascot, Uga VI, rests on a refreshingly cool bag of ice during the during the Nokia Sugar Bowl game against the Florida State University Seminoles at the Louisiana Superdome on January 1, 2003 in New Orleans, Louisiana. Georgia defeated FSU 26-13. Doug Pensinger Getty Images The Georgia Bulldog mascot, UGA VI, waits in his doghouse prior the game against the LSU Tigers at Sanford Stadium on October 2, 2004 in Athens, Georgia. Jamie Squire Getty Images UGA VI, the team mascot of the Georgia Bulldogs, watches on before the start of their game against the UAB Blazers on September 16, 2006 at Sanford Stadium in Athens, Georgia. Georgia defeated UAB 34-0. Streeter Lecka Getty Images Georgia mascot UGA VI watches the action during their game against Vanderbilt at Sanford Stadium on October 14, 2006 in Athens, Georgia. Scott Halleran Getty Images ATHENS, GA - SEPTEMBER 18: Georgia Bulldogs mascot UGA VI is seen during their game against the Marshall Thundering Herd on September 18, 2004 at Sanford Stadium in Athens, Georgia. Craig Jones Getty Images ATHENS, GA - AUGUST 30: UGA VII cools off in his doghouse during the game between the Georgia Bulldogs and the Georgia Southern Eagles at Sanford Stadium on August 30, 2008 in Athens, Georgia. The Bulldogs defeated the Eagles 45-21. Mike Zarrilli Getty Images Georgia Bulldogs mascot Uga looks on during the game with the Arizona State Sun Devils on September 20, 2008 at Sun Devil Stadium in Tempe, Arizona. Stephen Dunn Getty Images ATHENS, GA - SEPTEMBER 27: UGA VII, the mascot of Georgia sits on the sidelines as the Alabama Crimson Tide take on the Georgia Bulldogs at Sanford Stadium on September 27, 2008 in Athens, Georgia. Alabama defeated Georgia 41-30. Doug Benc Getty Images ATHENS, GA - OCTOBER 11: UGA VII, mascot of the Georgia Bulldogs stands the field during the game against the Tennessee Volunteers at Sanford Stadium on October 11, 2008 in Athens, Georgia. Kevin C. Cox Getty Images Fullscreen ATHENS, GA - NOVEMBER 29: Georgia Bulldogs mascots Hairy Dawg (R) and UGA VII pose together for photos before the game against the Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets at Sanford Stadium on November 29, 2008 in Athens, Georgia. The Yellow Jackets defeated the Bulldogs 45-42. Mike Zarrilli Getty Images ORLANDO, FL - JANUARY 1: The mascot of the University of Georgia UGA VII watches play against the Michigan State Spartans at the 2009 Capital One Bowl at the Citrus Bowl on January 1, 2009 in Orlando, Florida. Al Messerschmidt Getty Images UGA VII, mascot of the Georgia Bulldogs, against the South Carolina Gamecocks at Sanford Stadium on September 12, 2009 in Athens, Georgia. Kevin C. Cox Getty Images UGA VII, mascot of the Georgia Bulldogs, watches the game against the Louisiana State University Tigers from the sidelines at Sanford Stadium on October 3, 2009 in Athens, Georgia. Kevin C. Cox Getty Images UGA VII, mascot of the Georgia Bulldogs, sits on the field during the game against the Florida Gators at Jacksonville Municipal Stadium on October 31, 2009 in Jacksonville, Florida. (Photo by Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images) Kevin C. Cox Getty Images Georgia Bulldogs mascot UGA VIII watches the action during the game against the Florida Gators at EverBank Field on October 30, 2010 in Jacksonville, Florida. Sam Greenwood Getty Images UGA VIII, mascot of the Georgia Bulldogs, against the Auburn Tigers at Jordan-Hare Stadium on November 13, 2010 in Auburn, Alabama. Kevin C. Cox Getty Images UGA IX, mascot of the Georgia Bulldogs, sits in his doghouse proir to the game against the Florida Atlantic Owls at Sanford Stadium on September 15, 2012 in Athens, Georgia. Kevin C. Cox Getty Images JACKSONVILLE, FL - OCTOBER 27: UGA IX, the mascot of the Georgia Bulldogs walks on the field during the game between the Florida Gators and the Georgia Bulldogs at EverBank Field on October 27, 2012 in Jacksonville, Florida. Sam Greenwood Getty Images Georgia Bulldogs mascot UGA relaxes during the game against the LSU Tigers at Sanford Stadium on September 28, 2013 in Athens, Georgia. Scott Cunningham Getty Images
